title: Storm Front
text: This hidden cult within House [[Lyrandar]] holds that the [[Mark of Storm]] is a gift from the [[Devourer]], not [[Arawai]] and [[Kol Korran]]. The Storm Front believes that great bearers of the Mark of Storm live on after death as [[kraken]]s in the deeps and will arise when called to ensure Lyrandar dominance over sea, sky, and even land.
